column1: Local Foods////This time around I had the salt and pepper roast beef sammich. The roast beef itself was good and I liked the addition of kale and curried cauliflower
column2: though it was hard to detect over the overpowering flavor of horseradish. The house-made chips were on point as usual
column3: but the market gai-lan was very unusual. I love Chinese broccoli as much as the next aZn
column4: but something about the combination of that + black eyed peas
column7: tomato seemed pell mell and not necessarily complimentary. Honestly
column8: I probably wouldn't order that side again.
